description:
World Time Lite & World Time Pro are the ultimate world time tracking applications for the HP WebOS. The user interface has a sleek design that is both aesthetically pleasing and easy to use, making it the most appealing world time application on the HP WebOS.

World Time Lite & World Time Pro are lean and versatile applications that allow users to display the local time at various cities worldwide on a simple scrollable screen. Both versions of the app allow the user to maintain multiple Time Lists to reduce the need to keep modifying one set of preferences. World Time Lite and World Time Pro are available for any HP WebOS device including the Pre, Pre Plus, Pixi, and Pixi Plus. World Time Lite includes the following features:
* World Map
* Slick Design
* Configurable Latitude and Longitude
* Configurable Daylight Savings Time
* Automatic Daylight Savings Time
* 2 Time Lists

In addition to the features in World Time Lite, the Pro version also includes:
* Ad Free
* Add Custom Cities
* Add Countries
* Time Calculator Multi-City Alarm
* Dashboard Snooze and Edit time
* Background Alarms
* Alarms for different cities
* Alarms from ringtones or any song on phone
* Snooze Time Customization
* Custom Sorted List
* Unlimited Time Lists
* Now with Rotating full screen map option!!!
* Add custom location by GPS
*Now with Sun Coverage map, weather and sorting features

Any questions please contact support for instant feedback.
